unnormalised: Feeling the pinch of that college fee, yaar? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are the new "in" thing in EdTech, making finding financial aid easier than ordering biryani online.
normalised: Feeling the pinch of that college fee, yaar? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are the new "in" thing in EdTech, making finding financial aid easier than ordering biryani online.

unnormalised: Think of these portals as your personal matchmaking service, connecting you with scholarships you actually qualify for. Forget sifting through endless government websites - these platforms curate opportunities from private trusts, NGOs, and even individual donors.
normalised: Think of these portals as your personal matchmaking service, connecting you with scholarships you actually qualify for. Forget sifting through endless government websites - these platforms curate opportunities from private trusts, N G O's, and even individual donors.

unnormalised: Sites like Buddy4Study and Vidyalakshmi are popular among students aiming for IIT or even courses in fine arts at Santiniketan. They offer options ranging from merit-based Rs. 50,000 scholarships to needs-based programs covering entire tuition fees. Registration often closes around 30/06/2024, so check deadlines!
